title: Registered Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals
Interview Descriptions: Straightforward and smooth process. The Human Resources department was patient, understanding and thorough. Once the ball is rolling with onboarding, it is a breeze. I was extremely impressed with the team's responsiveness when I had a question or concern that needed to be addressed.

title: Registered Nurse Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (San Antonio, TX) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very friendly, and I was offered the position. I was then given a tour of the unit. It was a good experience. I can't wait to start.

title: Nurse Externship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Merrillville, IN) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly, laid back and informative. Made me feel at ease to ask questions and also answer without feeling judged.  HR wasn't involved which made it easier to communicate directly with thr nurse manager
Interview Questions: What I was willing to learn while there

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very easy going interview. I didn't feel pressure at all. They made me feel like I was already a team member. The first interview was over the phone and then I was called in for an additional interview.
Interview Questions: Describe why you would be right for this department.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very easy going! Felt like everyone was interested in learning about me. No issues. Glad I felt comfortable. Accepted the position. It was a group interview setting, and everyone asked a question
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work here

title: Food Service Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Gary, IN)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process is thorough and very upfront. You will have to abide by the rules if you get hired. Uniform is for you to supply. Decent pay overall. The job is strict.
Interview Questions: What is your previous work experience?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very thorough and friendly. The company seems like a nice atmosphere and friendly staff and management.  I would recommend this company to friends whi might be on the job hunt.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Interview Descriptions: Questions about your life and why you want to change jobs. What are your weakness and strongest in your life? What can you bring to the table? Are you willing to move up once you succeed.
Interview Questions: How long have i been in my position im appling for?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals
Interview Descriptions: A very, very long interview (I think almost 2 hours) with a manager who is no longer there. It was very personal and I felt like we got to know each other way more than an average interview. It was more or less a discussion about our views of healthcare which was awesome as it is important to compare values to a potential unit. He didn't really ask me any questions at all, none of the everyday "name strong points" or any of that. We really just sat down and talked. He was very honest about faults and benefits of the unit which turned out to be true.
Interview Questions: Who was your hardest clinical instructor and why?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Merrillville, IN) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and heard back from HR within 2 weeks. Interviewed the next week with the nursing manager face to face. The manager was nice and told me about the basics of the hospital. An hour after leaving the interview received a call from HR about an offer.
Interview Questions: None we just conversed about what I did at previous job.

title: Environmental Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (San Antonio, TX)
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer, the department head, never arrived to do the interview.  She was unable to be located.  After waiting 45 minutes, Human Resources, explained she was working on a project that would take another 30 minutes (it was now lunch time), would I like to wait or would I like a return call to reschedule.  I asked for a return call, I never received a return call.
Interview Questions: I never was given the opportunity to speak with the interviewer, she was a no show.

title: CSR Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Gary, IN)
Interview Descriptions: Initially it took a while to be contacted but subsequent communication was ok. The first interview was your basic "tell me about yourself" type.. The next was with the office manager and lastly the doctor.

title: Patient Care Assistant (PCA) Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (San Antonio, TX) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions:
I was contacted through email , then scheduled formal interview. I went in about 2 weeks later and was to go to HR to have a drug screen . 
The following week, I was given the orientation dates and was to begin my shift 2 weeks later.
This was in 2016/2017 so I may be little off.
Interview Questions: What do you like to do in your free time?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Merrillville, IN) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Met with HR representative and then was taken to meet my hiring manager.  I was then taken on a tour of the unit.  I went home and received a call offering me the job later that day
Interview Questions: Name a problem you had and what you did to resolve it;  If you saw someone stealing how would you handle it?

title: Applications Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Merrillville, IN) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward and thorough the entire way.  HR was very helpful and answered all my questions, made me feel like it would be a great organization to be a part of.
Interview Questions: What types of projects have you worked on that you really enjoyed?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Gary, IN)
Interview Descriptions: It was wonderful, nice people, fast, efficient
Interview Questions: none, they are straight forward and kind

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (Merrillville, IN) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very Concise: Online Application, Telephone Screening Interview, Face to Face w/ HR before prospective manager. Manager to be was genuine, open, challenged me to accept so I could expand my scope of practice. She even had an inside track on salary & orientation.
Interview Questions:
Are you going to be able to stay part of a team to help save lives when you may not necessarily like that person/persons? How much do you practice diversity in your life?
What do you do to balance your work with your home life?

title: Director - Facilities Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Methodist Hospitals (San Antonio, TX) in Sept 2009
Interview Descriptions: Received from HR; Interviewed with Execs; Interviewed with peers; Interviewed with subordinates.
Interview Questions: What accomplishment in your career are you the most proud of?
